definitions.body: hearth, altar-hearth (LXX )Arihl; fr. [[ארה]] with [[ל]] aff. acc. to Ew:§ 163 g Ol:§ 220 Sm Ez Eze 43:15 Di Is 29:1 al.; but this formation very rare & here dub.; Targum Hi De Brd Or Is 29:1 der. fr. [[אל]] + [[ארי]] = hearth of Ēl, v. also RS:Sem. i. 469, who thinks of pillar-altars; cf. [[אראלדודה]] MI:12 v. Sm & So, and Dr:Sm xci)—[[אראיל]] Kt Ez Eze 43:15, Eze 43:16; (Qr [[אֲרִיאֵל]]); = [[הַרְאֵל]] v:Eze 43:15 (Vrss Co [[אריאל]]), all c. art.,—of altar-hearth in Ezekiel's temple.
